raw akas.title: Jadefieber - Auf der Jagd nach dem grünen Gold

akas: Jadefieber - Auf der Jagd nach dem grünen Gold Germany
akas from release info: Jadefieber - Auf der Jagd nach dem grünen Gold Germany

1.title: Head Start
1.plot: After 3 years of unsuccessful partnerships, Claudia's decided this mining season will be on her own terms - and on her own dime. The crew is packed up and ready to head out to Wolverine a month early, but thick ice on the trail puts a stop to the trip before it even starts. A disagreement between Claudia and Robin leads to a disastrous reconnaissance mission that puts crew members at risk, and forces Claudia to re-think her entire season.

2.title: Hard Core
2.plot: Still determined to start their mining season early, Claudia follows Robin to an old claim close to home - the Dynasty jade mine. In an unexplored site on the claim, they make an exciting discovery that could change their entire summer. Meanwhile, Josh has ambitions to take over as excavator operator, but his own impatience prevents Gary from teaching him the necessary skills.

3.title: Tip of the Iceberg
3.plot: Guy struggles to topple a giant jade lense using just his excavator. After a frustrating breakdown, family conflicts erupt. And when Josh's safety concerns at the site are ignored, he questions his future in the family business.

4.title: You're My Boy Blue
4.plot: The crew heads out to recover a quad that was swept down the overflowing Turnagain River. Back at Dynasty, Guy and Gary make a second discovery that has Robin and Claudia excited. When Josh's dog, Blue, disappears into the Cassiar mountains, a frantic search begins to get her home safely.

5.title: Uphill Battle
5.plot: A brand new saw arrives in Jade City, and the crew puts it to the test cutting an heirloom boulder mined by Claudia's father 30 years ago. Robin wants to cut the giant lens at Dynasty quickly, but old equipment hampers the operation and the crew struggles to overcome the biggest technical challenge of the season.

6.title: All Slice, No Dice
6.plot: A mistake delays the crew's first crack at cutting the Pit 3 lens, and when the inside is finally revealed, deep fractures plague the giant piece of jade. On Highway 37, a food truck rollover provides Jade City with a produce bounty, but when a second truck rolls over on the same curve, Claudia asks for the police to help crack down on tired drivers.

7.title: Slipping Away
7.plot: The crew struggles in the rain and mud to make a deeper cut on the Pit 3 lens. When Claudia learns an important buyer is on his way to Jade City, the race is on to expose high quality jade. Meanwhile rain and run-down equipment can't dampen Josh's excitement at finally being given a task in the excavator.

8.title: Failing Grade
8.plot: As the crew races to make a fourth cut on the Pit 3 lens, an important jade buyer, Henry, arrives in Jade City. To everyone's disappointment, the jade quality fails to impress Henry. Despite the crews objections, Claudia explores the idea of moving to 2 Mile, an untouched hard rock jade claim high in the Cassiar Mountains.

9.title: Moving Day
9.plot: Claudia's crew is pushed to their limit with the immense task of tearing down and moving their mining camp to 2 Mile. When illness and a heat wave strike the camp, tempers flare. Claudia worries that the late-summer move could tear apart her crew and sink her mining season.

10.title: Battered and Bruised
10.plot: On the rough road to 2 Mile, Josh struggles with a heavy, unstable load and gets separated from the convoy. He faces a lonely night on the trail while Robin and Claudia forge ahead to the new mine site. The steep climb up to 2 Mile puts Scrappy Larry's battered army truck to the test.

11.title: The Curse of Wolverine
11.plot: As the crew struggle to build their new camp, Gary and Guy head out to reclaim their own mine, Wolverine. But Guy believes the old site is cursed and won't let them go without a fight. As time in the season ticks away, Claudia is anxious to break ground at the new site.

12.title: Shower Day
12.plot: The crew prospects their brand new site and see more jade than any previous claim they've mined. Surprise visitors Tony and Henry drop in to see their progress at the new site. Roughing it in the partially built camp wears on the crew, and tempers flare as they get to work on the finishing touches.

13.title: Medio-Core
13.plot: At 2 Mile, the crew is preparing for their final push before winter. Josh and Gary head back to the landing for a load of fuel. But after a delayed delivery and problems on the road, Claudia stresses when they fail to return to camp before nightfall. Claudia and Robin explore the new claim and begin drilling, desperate to hit grade A jade before winter hits.

14.title: We Found Jade
14.plot: After a rough summer and with no Grade A jade to her name, Claudia is desperate to turn things around before winter brings mining to a halt. Drill cores at a new lens could be the win she needs, and when an early snowfall hits the mountains, the race is on to get the jade and themselves out.

1.title: Jade Fever
1.plot: Bickering breaks out as jade drill holes come up empty, threatening to derail the whole mining season.

2.title: Got a Rope
2.plot: Claudia, Robin and the crew scramble to get their heavy equipment up a mountain before rising rivers make it impossible to get to the mining claim.

3.title: The Long March
3.plot: Tensions flare as the crew struggles to get heavy equipment up a muddy, boulder-strewn 120km trail to set up a new jade mine on a mountaintop.

4.title: Slippery Slope
4.plot: The crew tries to get their machinery across surging rivers to set up their new mountaintop jade mine.

5.title: Hide and Seek
5.plot: Alan is convinced there's jade under a pit full of water on their Dynasty claim. Josh's mechanical skills are tested while trying to get a giant boulder to a new buyer.

6.title: No Jade Until Blood Is Spilled
6.plot: Robin tries to defy the laws of physics to get a massive new bunkhouse to their Wolverine claim. A serious accident shocks Jade City.

7.title: The Curse of the Jade
7.plot: A string of bad luck dogs the Jade City crew and everyone comes up with unique solutions to chase away the demons.

8.title: Rude Awakening
8.plot: Everyone gets excited as they finally start digging up promising green boulders that the crew thinks are worth millions.

9.title: Company's Coming
9.plot: Tensions boil over as the overseas investors drop by unexpectedly to check up on work at the Wolverine mining site and Alan tries to make peace.

10.title: Out of Bounds
10.plot: After finally uncovering some promising boulders at the Wolverine mine, the crew discovers they may have breached their claim lines.

11.title: Down to the Wire
11.plot: Tension mounts as the end of mining season nears and the Jade City crew grows anxious to find that elusive million-dollar boulder.

12.title: It Ain't Easy Finding Green
12.plot: Subzero temperatures challenge the Jade City miners rushing to hit the jackpot-a jade boulder big enough to impress the investors-before the season ends.

1.title: Mountains to Climb
1.plot: Claudia and Robin's untested machines start breaking down on the brutal trek up to the Wolverine mine site.

2.title: Out in the Cold
2.plot: The crew tries to cross swollen rivers as they march their machines up to the mine, but Josh falls behind in his trouble-prone excavator.

3.title: 500 Bolts
3.plot: When more bolts come loose on his excavator, Josh is stranded 20 kilometers from the Wolverine mine and out of radio contact. At camp, Claudia sends Guy to help her son get the excavator going so they can start mining.

4.title: Loaded
4.plot: Mining season starts and, while the jade proves elusive, a trucking accident turns into a bonanza for Jade City.

5.title: An Ounce of Hope
5.plot: Guy is left in charge of Wolverine, where breaking in a new worker threatens to derail his mission to find the first jade of the season.

6.title: May Jay!
6.plot: A fatality on a nearby jade mine serves as a wake-up call for the crew at the Wolverine mine site. But before they can revamp their safety procedures, new guy Jay collapses in terrible pain.

7.title: Walk Hard
7.plot: Josh is stranded walking in the new excavator while a stockpile of worthless rocks prompts Claudia to consider a new mining strategy.

8.title: Big Chunk of Green
8.plot: Alan brings a group of buyers to Jade City sending Claudia's team into a panic to find the first sell-able jade boulders of the season.

9.title: Sink, Sank, Sunk
9.plot: While the crew slogs through mud to find a million dollar boulder, Josh risks losing half a million dollars of equipment trying to pull his truck out of a sinkhole.

10.title: Fractured
10.plot: The team finds the best jade boulder of the season, but risk undermining its value as they try to cut away all the fractures.

11.title: The Jade Whisperer
11.plot: Claudia's son Justin shows he has a nose for jade, while Scrappy Larry, Robin and Josh struggle to tow their broken truck off the trail to Wolverine.

12.title: Mystery Rock
12.plot: A run of duds force Robin and Justin on a last ditch quest to go prospecting for jade rocks to salvage the season while Scrappy Larry rushes to get a diesel tank converted into a hot tub in time for a community party.

13.title: Code Brown
13.plot: Claudia's venture to house a work crew in Jade City is threatened when the septic tank backs up into the drinking water.

14.title: The Big One
14.plot: With cold weather settling in early and debts piling up, the crew pushes, pulls and drags a mammoth and potentially season-saving boulder to camp.

15.title: Jaded
15.plot: With the most promising boulder of the year under the saws at Wolverine, Josh and R2 crash their truck, leaving Claudia and the crew reeling.

16.title: Escape from Wolverine
16.plot: The race is on to get out of Wolverine camp before the snow buries everything. With R2 back on the trail, driving out the most valuable jade of the season, Alan tells Claudia and Robin that he's opening a jade store in Beijing.

1.title: Hard Climb
1.plot: Claudia is forced to drive the rock truck as her crew struggles up the rocky trail to their mountaintop jade camp, Wolverine.

2.title: Breakdown and Meltdowns
2.plot: Claudia and Robin struggle to lead their crew and equipment across rivers and over boulder-strewn paths to reach their Wolverine jade camp. Claudia has a meltdown driving the rock truck. Gary runs out of gas in the middle of nowhere.

3.title: Digging In
3.plot: Claudia and Robin try to impress their new business partners but the first days at their new claim, Bullion Creek, are frustrating.

4.title: Cutting Crew
4.plot: The season's first huge boulder is brought back to camp and put under the saw. A first-aid emergency forces Josh into action with his newly-minted training.

5.title: High Stakes Claim
5.plot: Justin races to stake a claim after he stumbles onto an amazing jade find but other miners are circling in.

6.title: Eyes on the Prize
6.plot: While Claudia and Robin try to prove to their new business partners there's good jade on their claim, Justin and the crew becomes obsessed with finding a way to move and cut a 40-ton boulder that could make them instant millionaires.

7.title: Shut Out
7.plot: When Claudia's business deal collapses, she struggles to restart mining at Wolverine, but finds out her mine site camp is out of bounds. Meanwhile Justin and Mike decide to reopen the Dynasty mine before the season ends.

8.title: Start It Up
8.plot: Everyone scrambles to help Justin and Mike set up a new jade quarry at the Dynasty mine. Scrappy Larry mutilates the highway moving the excavator down the highway. Josh cuts boulders around Jade City that Claudia tries to sell to a buyer.

9.title: Slabs of Jade
9.plot: Tensions run high between Justin and Mike as impatient investors force them to abandon their quarrying plans and prove there is sellable jade at Dynasty. The community pitches in to help Scrappy Larry's diesel tank hot tub dream a reality.

10.title: Night Moves
10.plot: Cold weather, frozen water lines and the threat of snow force the crew to set up lights and work all night to get the jade slabs quarried. Alan Qiao returns from China to assess the jade.

11.title: The Big Fin
11.plot: Justin and Mike fight through snow and frozen water to get to the one potentially high value slab of jade-the Big Fin. In Jade City, Claudia cuts open a tourist's 700-year-old dinosaur egg.

12.title: The Bunce Dynasty
12.plot: Winter arrives at Dynasty and the crew struggle to mine up to the last possible minute. Claudia and Robin are worried Justin and Mike are pushing themselves too hard.

imdb.plot outline: Jade City is a remote highway stop in northern British Columbia with a community of 35 run by Claudia Bunce and her husband Robin. They mine a huge jade claim and they employ most of the people in town. If they and their Chinese investors strike it rich, everyone wins; if they fail, a whole town falls flat on its face.
imdb.title: Jade Fever
plot: Jade City is a remote highway stop in northern British Columbia with a community of 35 run by Claudia Bunce and her husband Robin. They mine a huge jade claim and they employ most of the people in town. If they and their Chinese investors strike it rich, everyone wins; if they fail, a whole town falls flat on its face.
